    • Constructor Detail

      • Department

        public Department​(java.lang.String name,
                  int sessionCountPerWeek,
                  int memberCount)
        Constructor for Department. Initialize the instance variables. Initially the department will have zero budget. The maximum number of members will be 30*sessionCountPerWeek.
        Parameters:
        name - Stores the department name.
        sessionCountPerWeek - Stores number of work sessions per week.
        memberCount - Stores number of members.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

      • getMemberCount

        public int getMemberCount()
        Returns:
        Number of members.

      • calculateBudget

        public int calculateBudget()
        Calculate the budget cost of the department based on sessionCountPerWeek and memberCount. Assign calculated budget to the instance variable budget. budget=5000*sessionCountPerWeek*memberCount;
        Specified by:
        calculateBudget in interface Organization
        Returns:
        Calculated budget.

      • addNewMember

        public boolean addNewMember()
        Add a new member to department if possible.
        Specified by:
        addNewMember in interface Organization
        Returns:
        True if member added else false.
